items.title: Awesome Artificial Intelligence
items.content_text:
### Learning / Commerical Tools

*   [Awesome Community Detection (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/benedekrozemberczki/awesome-community-detection) - Clustering graph structured data
*   [Awesome Decision Tree Papers (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/benedekrozemberczki/awesome-decision-tree-papers) - Decision tree papers from machine learning conferences
*   [Awesome Gradient Boosting Papers (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/benedekrozemberczki/awesome-gradient-boosting-papers) - Gradient boosting papers from machine learning conferences
*   [Awesome Fraud Detection Papers (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/benedekrozemberczki/awesome-fraud-detection-papers) - Fraud detection papers from machine learning conferences
items.content_html:

  • Awesome Fraud Detection Papers (‚≠ê1.7k) - Fraud detection papers from machine learning conferences

items.title: Awesome React Components

items.title: Awesome Libgdx
items.content_text:
### Resources / Algorithms and AI

*   [gdx-ai (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/libgdx/gdx-ai) - Artificial Intelligence framework featuring Steering Behaviors, Formation Motion, Pathfinding, Behavior Trees and Finite State Machines.

### Resources / Controllers

*   [gdx-controllerutils (‚≠ê60)](https://github.com/MrStahlfelge/gdx-controllerutils) - Adds Scene2D button input support, user configurable button mappings and hotplugging for LWJGL2.

### Resources / Services

*   [steamworks4j (‚≠ê496)](https://github.com/code-disaster/steamworks4j) - A thin wrapper which allows Java applications to access the Steamworks C++ API.

### Resources / User Interface

*   [gdx-dialogs (‚≠ê80)](https://github.com/TomGrill/gdx-dialogs) - Provides cross-platform support for native dialogs.
*   [InGameConsole (‚≠ê136)](https://github.com/StrongJoshua/libGDX-inGameConsole) - Allows a developer to add a console (similar to how it is featured in Source games) to their game.

### Resources / Visual Effects

*   [Box2DLights (‚≠ê262)](https://github.com/libgdx/box2dlights) - 2D lighting framework that uses Box2D for raycasting and OpenGL ES 2.0 for rendering.
*   [Particle Park (‚≠ê75)](https://github.com/raeleus/Particle-Park) - A showcase of downloadable particle effects with live previews.

### Resources / Others

*   [gdxGifRecorder (‚≠ê39)](https://github.com/Anuken/GDXGifRecorder) - A utility class that records a GIF and saves it automatically.
*   [noise4j (‚≠ê105)](https://github.com/czyzby/noise4j) - Simple map generators based on various procedural content generation tutorials.
items.content_html:
Resources / Algorithms and AI

  • gdx-ai (‚≠ê1.3k) - Artificial Intelligence framework featuring Steering Behaviors, Formation Motion, Pathfinding, Behavior Trees and Finite State Machines.

Resources / Controllers

  • gdx-controllerutils (‚≠ê60) - Adds Scene2D button input support, user configurable button mappings and hotplugging for LWJGL2.

Resources / Services

  • steamworks4j (‚≠ê496) - A thin wrapper which allows Java applications to access the Steamworks C++ API.

Resources / User Interface

  • gdx-dialogs (‚≠ê80) - Provides cross-platform support for native dialogs.
  • InGameConsole (‚≠ê136) - Allows a developer to add a console (similar to how it is featured in Source games) to their game.

Resources / Visual Effects

  • Box2DLights (‚≠ê262) - 2D lighting framework that uses Box2D for raycasting and OpenGL ES 2.0 for rendering.
  • Particle Park (‚≠ê75) - A showcase of downloadable particle effects with live previews.

Resources / Others

  • gdxGifRecorder (‚≠ê39) - A utility class that records a GIF and saves it automatically.
  • noise4j (‚≠ê105) - Simple map generators based on various procedural content generation tutorials.
